name: Beth Trawick
text: Superior stone was wonderful to work with. Kayleigh was quick to respond to my questions and bring me samples to look at. They worked with us to have our flooring installed on the exact days we wanted it. Their product was top notch at a very reasonable price. Gavin and Shane who were the installers went above and beyond to give great service. They were quick, professional, and very skilled in their trade. I will definitely use Superior Stone for any future flooring needs and would recommend them without reservation to anyone who needs floor covering in our area. Awesome company!

name: Windham Pittman
text:
Holley did an outstanding job!
I wasn't even there for the job, she took complete control, from start to finish..very trustworthy!
Highly recommend!!

name: christina addy
text: Superior Stone was fantastic to work with! They were patient with us as we borrowed numerous samples to match paint and styles for our home. Made great recommendations for cuts styles. They were fairly priced and turned out a phenomenal product. Thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate all our customers.

name: Priscilla Mead
text: We had a beautiful piece of granite installed on a kitchen island. The installation was quick and beautifully done.

name: Mark Stone
text: Good pricing but it was hard getting scheduled for the job because of being behind on other jobs. Responses to text and e-mails were slow. Finally got job done and granite countertops look nice but glue failed at one of the seams a couple months later. Finally just end up gluing it back myself after failed attempts to fit the problem  into their current schedule.

name: Danleigh Stinner
text: I have worked with Superior Stone Company on numerous occasions, and each time they have been amazing! Very professional each time, pay attention to detail, and constantly keeping me in the loop on what’s going on. I am 100% a total perfectionist and I will nit pick everything, and each time the installers (we have had a few, because we have had a few jobs done at different times and locations) have been awesome! The girls who work the store are also just as great as the installers. I would recommend them to ANYONE!

name: Stacie Diaz
text: Purchase some countertops and they are stunning.  Without  actually  picking  out a style  Holly sent me some pictures and made a recommendation. It is everything I wanted. The guys we Extremely skilled  and fast with the install.

name: Donna Dew
text: Great customer service!

name: Kassi
text: Very pleased with the service and quality of my purchase.  Customer service was exceptional Ms. Kalli went above & beyond and was able to answer all of my questions. The turn around time was also great. I'll definitely be coming back for more and I highly recommend this company.

name: Amanda Zorn
text: We had our bathroom countertops replaced with granite. Superior Stone was fast, friendly, and did a beautiful job. They have SO much to choose from, and were super knowledgeable and helpful. Working with this company was a breeze. If you are looking for granite, flooring, or cabinetry, they will not steer you wrong. Thank you Superior Stone for my beautiful bathrooms!

name: Kim Watson
text: We purchased flooring from Superior Stone Company for our entire house and it is gorgeous.  The knowledge, friendliness and service is hands down the best. We will be recommending them to all of our friends and family.  Thank you again for a wonderful experience.

name: Brooke Cavanaugh
text: Replaced bathroom counters with quartz and it looks amazing!  Super easy process - if you've been thinking of upgrading for years like me - give them a call - you won't be disappointed!

name: Donna Dew
text: Beautiful showroom and a fabulous  choice in product.   Customer service is the best in the Wiregrass!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Donna! We really appreciate the kind words. Have a blessed day!

name: Kendall Mims
text: I cannot say enough GREAT things about this company!!  I priced marble and granite in several locations.  Alabama Marble & Granite not only beat their prices, but they beat their customer service by a landslide!!  Building a new home is very stressful, but not one time was I ever stressed out about my marble and granite countertops.  They look amazing!!!  We will continue using Alabama Marble & Granite over and over and over again!!

resp.text: We loved getting to work with you guys! We try to take that stressful part out and make it a fun process. I am SO happy you love those tops. They turned out beautifully. Please let us know if you ever need anything! Have a blessed day and enjoy your home :)

name: JA Blackwell
text: Could not be happier. The end product looks (shadow quartz) better than I could have imagined. The experience from choosing the color and type of counter top to the friendly and helpful installers went super smooth. No problems. This company does what they say they are going to do. Top notch.

resp.text: Thank you so very much!! It was such a pleasure working with you!! If you need anything in the future please reach out to us!!

name: Abby Champion
text:
Alabama Marble and Granite worked with us to ensure we got the best experience! From sending pictures via text of samples to knowing all about each countertop, Victoria was simply fantastic! They are professional, and very quick! We had our countertops installed within a week!

Overall fabulous! I would recommend them 5/5 times!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We appreciate the kind words, if you ever need anything at all please feel free to give us a call!!

name: James Betsill
text: This company does not do good work. They installed a set of kitchen countertops for a customer of mine and one piece had a crack in it on the day of install. After months of back and forth with them they claimed it wasn’t their fault and made us purchase another slab. The first one was also installed incorrectly and out of square and the second time was even worse. If you use them make sure you check the work before paying.

resp.text: Thanks for non level and cabinets and out square. Glad we worked with home owner directly. Don’t use this guy for cabinets. Btw we corrected his mistake at cost for the homeowner. The homeowner is happy via text

name: Ashley Lamar
text: Very friendly staff. They are easy to work with, offer a good variety of options and take a very reasonable amount of time to handle business from order to install. Very pleased with Drew and Kellie!

name: Samantha Slayton
text: Very professional and kind staff, you can definitely tell the owner has been doing this well over 20 years! I would recommend this place to anyone!!

name: Jeffery Peek
text: Countertop and cabinet, was the recommended people to do our countertop work. From colors to installation was very good. Modern equiptment and good installers made our kitchen standout. They offerd suggestions to enhance our kitchen. Very impressed with final appearance. Would definitely have Countertop and cabinets do our next project. Thanks again to Drew and kelly for a job well done. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you. It was a pleasure to work with you both

name: Virginia Ousley
text:
Working with the crew at Countertops and Cabinets, Wyatt, Drew, Kelci and the install crew was great. Very efficient,  polite and professional with each interaction.  Quality is amazing.  Beautiful job. Love my countertops.
Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you very much. Your kitchen is beautiful. Love the full height backsplash!

name: Jonathan Houston
text: I have worked for this company for almost a year now. We take pride in our work and the team we have now is a team that I would put up against any other team in the surrounding area. We are dedicated to giving the consumer nothing but quality and outstanding service. Call us for all of your countertops needs and wants. We will give the you magazine ready countertops at some of the best prices available.

name: Rhonda Brock
text: I am giving this company a one star because it will not let me pick a 0!! Worse company to buy countertops I have ever used! They put in quartzite cabinets with chips on the edges a broke corner and one price was cracked and cut wrong! So to fix it they brought a completely different countertop that doesn’t even match the rest of my kitchen!! I will be contacting the BBB on them and an attorney! When you pay over $4000 I think I should get better than this! Don’t use them!

resp.text:
I’m sorry that you feel that way Mrs Brock. I assume since you signed a completion/satisfaction sheet and paid us in full that everything was to your satisfaction. We’ve had no complaints since then after we left your house and you signed the completion/satisfaction form.
We did however cut a piece wrong but we remanufactured it for you because it was our fault at no charge Out of the same slab that you selected from our supplier who sent us the material you hand selected to cut that also has your signature on it. Not sure what else we can do to make you happy but will be glad to try.

name: Stephanie Magnusson
text:
*Editing to add: Someone came out and replaced our bathroom countertop. It looks fabulous and I couldn't be happier! Mistakes happen, but when a company fixes them, that speaks volumes to me. I'd use them again and I'd tell my friends to use them. Thanks Countertop and Cabinet for your wonderful service.

We had our kitchen and two bathrooms done. The granite is beautiful and the team was wonderful to work with picking everything out. They were quick to get everything done too. They were ready to install within 2 weeks! *However, there were a few things that could have been better with installation.  After having removed our sink faucets, part of a faucet (the plug) was misplaced or lost and that has been super frustrating because I wasn't planning on replacing it and it is expensive to replace that single part - they don't sell it separately from the faucet. Also, they drilled the holes not completely centered on the 3 sinks (each is slightly to the left) and one of the bathrooms was done very poorly. One of the three faucet holes was drilled too close to the backsplash, then realized it was too close so drilled a better distance, but got scratched in front of the holes and the faucet cannot cover up both mistakes. Josh said someone would come fill it, but it hasn't happened yet. Lastly, our master bathroom has a chunk knicked out of a corner and I didn't realize that until after signing the paper work.  I really like the granite we chose, but I have been dissapointed with what went wrong and that it hasn't been fixed.

resp.text: Sorry this never made I back to the office. I will schedule someone to go back out and address your concerns

name: M S
text: Me and my wife were looking for someone to do our countertops and not only did they take forever calling us back, but they were very rude on the phone. I asked other people about them and heard nothing but bad things. They seem to not mind taking your money but take months on something that should just take a few weeks. We will be looking elsewhere.

resp.text: - Monday thru Friday You are welcome to come by our showroom or call us. Sorry we missed your call. We are open 2057354490

name: Vincente Enriguez
text: Awesome product I highly recommend this place

name: joseph short
text: Amazing people to deal with. They worked around my schedule to do the install. They treated my home as if it was their own. Very clean and professional. They even took the time to go over how to care for my countertops. I will be using them in the future to do my kitchen. If you are looking for countertops these are the people to call and the people you want to install them.

name: Curtis Waldrep
text: Fantastic service, excellent product!

name: Tony Wynn
text: Very quick service. I placed the order for new granite countertops and they were installed in 7 business days. Josh was very professional and knowledgeable. I am very pleased with my countertops and would highly recommend Countertops and Cabinets to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank for the review. You guys were great to work with

name: Monica Dubberly
text: Josh and his crew did an amazing job on our countertops on Lot#1 in our subdivision. They are beautiful. We at Dubberly General contractors will be using them again. Thanks guys for going the extra mile to make sure they were taken care of after installation.

resp.text: Thanks Monica! You guys are great to work with. Looking forward to a long relationship in business together!

name: Jessie Hollingsworth
text:
They carried our expensive granite countertop to our new build dropped it on the ground before bringing it in chipping off a corner about an inch and a half. My wife and I was both at work while this happened no one had informed us about this from their company but our home builder did as they had a plumber working for them actually help bring it in afterward. When my wife and I got to our home they had already placed it on the island bar area trying to buff and sand the edge off to cover up what they had done. We noticed it right away and when we said something about replacing it they said no they will fix it.. well it took them 3 months to try to and we tried to give them a chance but we noticed the bonding material as they called it a patch that would hold up as if it was stone fell off ( we had found it laying on the floor). We mentioned to the supervisor about just replacing it or we wanted our money back he said no no we cant give you a refund but we promise to have it replace.. well we had to call and text and call and text they made no attempt to be in any hurry so i told the store manager 2 days ago via text ( because he hardly answers phone calls) to please let us know whats going on and after waiting a couple days he text back saying he was out of town but is back and will let me know end of the week.. well he never reached out so i text him today and he replied that he still had no word on when it would be ready. Then he goes on to text that the countertop wont match the other small section we had kept while trying to work with them.. told my wife she and i both feel like we have gave them enough opportunity for too many months to get a countertop that cost us thousands of dollars not to match and to look out of place.. so i asked the store manager to either take everything back and to start from the beginning or refund our money.. im still waiting for his reply and that has been 12 hours ago. I had also mentioned to the store manager that it has been very difficult not having a kitchen fully functional due to this and at this time we have a 5 month old he seemed to not care. We Havent reported this to bbb yet but probably will seeing as though it has taken them over 6 months total to get this problem resolved and their lack of communication or priority towards a good paying customer who paid in full ( still have our receipt) we will take this further if need be and dont mind seeing an attorney or any arbitration necessary we really dont care at this point. You can only take so much. We would not recommend them to anyone and if i could have scored them no stars i would have. They did come back later and put a countertop in but we found out and had already knew it was the same one but does look better than before. We just wished we had not been lied to and if someone is going to do the job, made it right as promised. Our cabinets was not through them, but we still are living with the scratches on them from prior work this countertop place had done. They did say they was going to fix it but would cost us extra for the paint.
Continued.. cabinet guy who works for this company has put us off for over a month now saying that he needed to get the wood shipment from mississippi. I got some wood at lowes and came out cheaper, done it myself and the outcome looks better than what they provided on their website. Overall, my wife and I am well pleased with what I have done to make our kitchen what we wanted it to be. We never asked those idiots to take a rigshaw to mississippi to get wood for free floating shelves.  2 Thumbs down on this review. I will tell all my friends, they will tell all theirs and i have thousands of customers who are always asking if I know a guy who can help them with kitchen remodeling and even new builds.. I will simply say, i know a company I will NOT recommend if you're looking to get it done professionally.

resp.text:
Hollingsworth,

Obviously there was a little more to this. I am glad that you let us come to your house on Saturday and replace it with a new piece. I hope you are happy with your kitchen. Hopefully the cabinet guy we recommended can fix what your previous one did with the lazy susan. We are 1 call away any time to help.

name: Drew Thornton
text: Price, Quality and Service

name: Kerry Gober
text: After poor install, a week ago. We were contacted by them and said they could redo the joints. Still no one has done that.They are telling us also, what was installed can't be fixed about the non centered sink. Looking at was done in the install, shows us they have no professional installers working for them.  I wouldn't recommend this company.

We had our bathroom remodeled by Carol's Carpets & they did a fantastic job.
Debra & Mike were great to work with. Everyone was always on time & went out of their way to make any necessary repairs. The bathroom is beautiful.
Thank you Debra for helping me pick out the tile. So satisfied!!

text: Our church had a pipe burst and it flooded half of our sanctuary on a Saturday. We contacted Slade Price with Carol’s Carpet and they worked with us and Alfa Insurance to get the price within our repair budget. The workers were quick, efficient and they expedited the work, so it was completed before our next Sunday service! Thank you Carol’s Carpet and Slade Price for the amazing job that you all did for us. We highly recommend Slade and the installers at Carol’s Carpet!

resp.text: We are glad you had a good experience. Thank you for leaving a review.

name: Kristy Blackwell
text: We had a wonderful experience with Carol’s carpet! Debra was our sales lady and she was extremely helpful and very knowledgeable! Rene was our installer and he and his crew were professional, pleasant, and did fantastic work! Our carpet looks beautiful in our new home and we couldn’t be more pleased!

name: Bentley Labriola
text: Stephanie Wright was SO wonderful! She helped with kitchen design and flooring that is beautiful and at a great price! The installation set up was super quick. They were so accommodating to our short timeline, also!!

name: Tom Moore
text: These folks have a high rating for a reason.  Kellie perfectly matched a 16 year old Brazilian Cherry in the rest of our home for our living room reno.  Installers are top notch, showed up on time and did a phenomenal job.  Look no further for your flooring needs.

name: Jimmie Reeves
text: I was disappointed when called.  They advertise that they do bathroom renovations, but THEY DO NOT.  They are limited in what they do to tile and floor coverings.

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear of your bad experience. Just in case you have reviewed the wrong company, please message me with your phone number. Carol’s Carpet Flooring America can tear out your entire bathroom and completely replace it if you like. My name is Drew and I would love to assist you with your project.

Thanks for your review, Drew Courson

name: Chuck Jenkins
text: I purchased some granite from Carol’s Carpet recently. If you decide to use them, Deborah is the best! The experience was great overall. Everything arrived on time and things. But after the product arrived at my home I realized that it was not sealed. The company refused to fix the issue. They directed me to seal it myself. They were super nice until they received my money. Smh

name: Cindy Wooten
text: We just had floors installed by Carols Carpets. We would highly recommend them. Kellie knew it was overwhelming to pick out the color.  She listened to my ideas and picked out samples.  Came to the house and helped us pick the color. Installers came when they said and worked very hard to do a great job. I love the floor. Makes a big difference.

name: Paula Kate Davis
text: My whole experience was very positive.  Starting from the first day I walked into the store. Slade was not only very knowledgeable but also friendly and accommodating.  After shopping around, I  made the great decision to go with Carol's.  They not only matched the competitor's price, but beat it! Their selection was also better and was able to settle on a beautiful carpet.  The installation was quick and easy and the installers did a wonderful job. I can't say enough good things about Carol's Carpets.  If you're looking for flooring, look no further than Carol's!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Stacey Timmons
text: I would truly recommend Carol's Carpet Flooring to my family and friends.  The floor looks wonderful. The compliments keep coming.  It was great working with Slade Price.  He is a very knowledgeable sales consultant.  The installers were punctual, professional and polite.  I look forward to working with them in the future.

name: Christine Riello
text: The service we received from Deborah was fantastic. The quality of the product, the price and the installation was just what we had hoped for. We love our carpeting and floors and will use them again in the future for our flooring projects.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Stephanie Hamil
text: We went to Carol’s Carpets based on a referral from a friend.  We are so glad we did.  Tony came to our house and worked with us to find the perfect wood floors.  The installers were professional and fast. They had all of our wood flooring installed in a day.  Thank you for a wonderful job. We highly recommend Tony and his team at Carol’s Carpet.

name: Jay Walt
text: My family and i are so very sorry for your loss. We are praying for your family, may God be with you. My inlaws have used this business a few times and have always been 100% satisfied.

name: Rick Aaron
text: Looked into several carpet companies' reviews and engaged two of them.  We went to Carol's Carpet second and ended up staying with them.  They won us with their personal, open approach.  We didn't feel like it was a pressured sales pitch when we talked to Mike at Carol's.  This was a departure from our first company's engagement.  We were pleased with our options.  Their prices were comparable and their special financing was excellent.  The installation went well and was completed in half a day.  We are very pleased with the service and the result.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Ann Grimes
text: We got new vinyl flooring the week after Thanksgiving. Slade our salesmen  showed us samples and measurements. Installers were polite and very neat ! The floor looks great !

name: Hannah Murray
text: We loved our experience with Carols Carpet. We purchased our carpet and a rug from them!  Kellie helped us and we always felt like we were in the best hands. I definitely recommend Carols Carpet for all of your flooring needs!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: William Hodge
text: I had a great experience with Stephanie Wright.  She was very professional and met my expectations.  I recently purchased flooring from Carols for s home we just purchased.  We will definitely use her again when needed.

name: Maria Morales
text: Very helpful, accommodating busy schedules and many options to choose from.

name: Lee Barton

She did a fabulous job that exceeded our expectations.  The installers were professional and on time. Thank you for a wonderful job. We highly recommend Stephanie and her team at Carol’s Carpet.

name: Lynn Young
text: Wonderful experience and our salesman Slade Price was on top of the entire process. Highly recommend!

name: David Lisenby

name: Ken Hargroves

text: Kellie was absolutely wonderful in helping us with our flooring. She Eve helped with picking out paint colors to blend with the floors.

name: Gary R
text: This was for return business to upgrade our flooring. The salesman, Tony, is a professional and always had the time and patience to help me through the process. Definitely recommend giving these guys a shot at your business.

name: Mike Easterling
text: Our carpet is BEAUTIFUL!  Our saleslady, May was outstanding & So  very helpful in picking the right carpet & color.  The workers were also outstanding! They did a fabulous job laying the carpet & putting everything back in place without scratching anything.  Manager, Lisa was so kind to call that evening to see how everything went. So yes, we were extremely pleased.

name: Jeannette Watts
text: Our experience at Carol Carpet was wonderful. My family and I are very please with the out come of our flooring. Kellie Reese was my sale rep and she was so welcoming and helpful. Her crew was thorough and sufficient. I was told it would take 2 to 3 days to complete the job, it took only 1 day. How great was that especially since it was close to the holidays and I needed the floors done before Christmas. Job well done!!. Thanks Kellie.

name: Elizabeth Dean
text: Tony McCarty has been super helpful in several commercial carpeting projects.  He takes care of the job from beginning to end and makes sure we have a great looking project every time.  Our experience with Carol's Carpet has always been great.

name: Brad Fountain
text: We’ve used Carol’s for new countertops and backsplash at our old house and received top dollar when we sold it. We used them again for carpet in our new home. Both times we had courteous and professional sales reps and installers. The end result was great and affordable. We will definitely be continued customers and recommend them to everyone!

name: Khalid Rasheed
text:
Tony McCarty  is very professional and knows what he is doing. I am very pleased with his work ethics and knowledge of his bussiness. He was very respectful, patient and detailed about the wood we choosed. He coordinated very well with my builder in a professional very. One of the best things is he is very honest and helpful. Also  carol carpet has great choices for flooring and great staff to work with. I would highly recommend carol carpet and Tony is great guy to work with.

Khalid

name: Daniel Chapman
text: Friendly and helpful ,very nice folks

name: Trish F.
text:
Beautiful Floors...Happy Customer!
We are extremely pleased with Carol's Carpet.
I had no idea what I wanted and Drew was so helpful. Everyone from Carol's were polite and professional.
We love our new floors and would definitely recommend Carol's Carpet.

name: Melissa Floyd
text: Have done business with Carol's Carpet for years.  Bought an older home that needed modernizing. Les Chamblee was our salesperson. He helped with granite countertops and tile for the kitchen, hardwood flooring and carpet for bedrooms. Les made the experience very enjoyable and painless. We are more that satisfied with the quality and service that we received. Kudos to Les and the team at Carol's Carpet Montgomery.

name: Josh Yates
text: The Montgomery team was excellent from when I walked into the front door to the professional installers who completed my vinyl flooring.

name: Sandra Fain
text: Carol's put new carpet in all four of my bedrooms...It looks fabulous!  I couldn't be more pleased!  The service was great and my salesman was more than efficient!

name: Jeanette James
text: We had the worst installers. They put big gouges in our floor trim, left nails comming through the tac stripes in every door, and left gaps in the padding. When I asked them to fix it they gave me a hard time saying that is the way it is. I contacted the store and got nothing resolved. Not happy with the service I received.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about the unresolved issue. My manager has contacted you and we look forward resolving the issue.

name: Matt Jordan
text: I've dealt with Carol's twice in the last year, and they have been just fantastic to work with -- friendly, informed, helpful, good value.

name: Pat Hayslip
text: Les Chamblee was most helpful & patient with my husband and I while in the store. After we made our choice for our flooring, he was on time for the appointment for measurements. Les was very professional, yet personable while in our home. He called us when the wood & carpet arrived & followed up when the work was completed. The installers were very nice also. Les called after the work was done to see if we were not only satisfied, but to see if he could help us with anything else. We love our wood floor and the tempur-pedic padding recommended by Les. Yes indeed, Carol's carpet, we will call on you again when needed. Les Chamblee is a plus to the business in our book.

name: Amanda Cook
text: This is the only place in Montgomery that I will go to buy carpet and flooring.

name: Vernon Hunter
text: Always support our local businesses

name: Martha Pearson
text: The staff are really great and helpful

name: Corinne Giles
text: Called to see if they had any Cynclips to use on my dropped kitchen sink and the man said they didn't use those, rather they drilled holes on the backside of the Granite when cutting.  (Which is the right way to do it, I have read.). He then gave me a several suggestions on how to fix the problem without buying the clips.  I was so appreciative since my husband is trying to tackle the issue instead of paying for someone to do it.  I will be contacting Surface One in the future to install bathroom countertops.

resp.text: Thank you, Corinne Giles! We appreciate that you took the time to post this review and we look forward to working with you on those bathroom tops. S1

text: Totally Satisfied!  Surface One in Pelham installed quartz countertops for us and we are so happy with the finished product.  Ryan helped us pick out the perfect countertops based on what we were looking for.  They were professional from the time we shopped until everything was done.  We went to several places for quotes and Surface One was cheaper than the others.

name: Melissa
text: Nice on phone but if you don't have a big project then don't bother. Drive 45 min for them not to help and not care.

name: Stuart Nicholson
text: We are very happy with the service and the counters that we received from Surface One. Everyone we dealt with was very happy and they went out of their way to get the material we preferred. name: Dawn Calvert
text: Great selection of material to choose from.  Great customer service!

name: Kevin McPherson
text: These guys are the best I have seen in the Birmingham area!  Otstanding customer service, great products, quality installations from a top notch, very professional solid surface company!!

text: We stopped in to get prices for a kitchen counter top remodel. Sales person not very knowledgeable and did not offer us a price while we were there. We will not be purchasing here

text: Awesome selection of granite and solid surface and very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very experienced fabricators and installers.

name: Liz Burton
text:
This company was subcontracted by my kitchen remodel company to provide granite countertops.  First issue is that they will not come measure 'after hours' so we had to take off work to be available.  The job required 4 pieces of granite, one to be joined.  Again we were asked to take off work to come view the work particularly the joint.  They had equipment in front of one of the pieces, so we missed the fact that this piece was too short on the end.  The sealer from counter to cabinet even showed.
We complained thru the contractor and Surface One gave them a heard time about  replacing it.  After weeks of waiting they sent two workers out and again the piece was too short.  After that, they finally sent someone out to measure again.  A third piece was sent out after 9 or so weeks and this piece finally fit.  Not only were we put out because of lost of time in the kitchen, but the installer with the third piece was the original installer and he told us he told the Source One owner that he knew we would not be happy with the first piece.  So this is the kind of shoddy work they try to get away with.  Not to mention the lack of cooperation with my contractor to work out the issue.  I would not recommend them.

name: Brenda Lynn
text: Great customer service. Very professional.
